id.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a single chat conversation with an entity.

id.description: The unique identifier for the conversation.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this conversation.

entity.description: The entity associated with this conversation.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the conversation was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the conversation was last updated.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a conversation.

id.description: The unique identifier for the message.

conversationId.description: The ID of the conversation this message belongs to.

role.description: The role of the message sender.

content.description: The text content of the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.
